name: @fluentui/react-icons
description: Fluent System Icons are a collection of familiar, friendly, and modern icons from Microsoft.

scripts.unfill: for file in ./components/*.tsx; do sed -i '.bak' 's/ fill="none"//' $file; rm $file.bak; done
scripts.build: npm run copy && npm run updatePrefix && npm run optimize && npm run convert && npm run unfill && npm run updateExport && npm run cleanSvg
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run cleanSvg && npm run build && npm run cleanSvg
scripts.updatePrefix: for file in ./intermediate/ic*.svg; do mv "$file" "${file/ic_fluent_/}"; done
scripts.updateExport: for file in ./components/*.tsx; do sed -i '.bak' 's/export const/export/' $file; rm $file.bak; done
